title: The tenements required for Shramsafalya/Ashrayyojana may be allowed to be constructed as per the provisions of Regulation (A) & (B) above with the special permission of Municipal Commissioner subject to condition that the sizes of tenements constructed shall be governed by the requirements of such schemes
clause_text: The tenements required for Shramsafalya/Ashrayyojana may be allowed to be constructed as per the provisions of Regulation (A) & (B) above with the special permission of Municipal Commissioner subject to condition that the sizes of tenements constructed shall be governed by the requirements of such schemes.
